website_summaries.verdict: Between its collection of iconic Kirby items, including the Star Wand and Sword costume, and his lively interchangeable faces, this is the ultimate figure for Kirby fans.
pros: Magnetic components make Kirby easy to pose

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Well done!!
customer_reviews.text: This Figure is really cool!! He is very smooth big, chubby, and a Kawaii magnet!! His arms and feet can move all round his body, so you could have the most ridiculous poses with this one!! I got him a little while ago. I have a stop motion series on my YouTube channel, the series is called: The Chubby Warrior!! So if you want to please go watch this adorable Kirby on action!!! (p.s be very carful with the fire holder piece!! I tried to put it in the little whole in the fire piece, and it broke... So be careful with that) ;)
customer_reviews.author: Dat boi

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: I wanna start by saying I've acquired link Samus Mario. When I found out Kirby was coming out to I was ecstatic. But my main concern was articulation. How can you get Kirby's iconic moves right on a figure? Well they outdid themselves this time. The figure is extremely articulated more so than the others. With a method using magnets. You can pose the hands and feet all around the faces interchange with magnets and lock safely and securely and I absolutely love and adore it. It's going to work perfect for my stop motion and any child will love this figure. I'm thinking about buying another one before its price Rockets.
customer_reviews.author: Saul

customer_reviews.title: High Quality and Great Idea on Magnetic Hands and Feet
customer_reviews.text: The materials used to make Kirby are very high quality, well worth the price considering he has four faces to swap between. I love the magnetic hands and feet which can be moved around to whatever position you like. I have already pre-ordered his second edition with Ice Kirby and the blue body.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and quality stuff
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my teenage daughter after having purchased (and fallen in love with) the Link Windwaker and Magaman versions. This is a quality product. The tons of hands and feet and other bits fit snugly and stay put. I will most definitely be purchasing many more of these amazing figurines.
customer_reviews.author: k nelson

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my little sister. Love that he's magnetic with the pieces that attach to him! She loves playing with it, so we're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jhazzie

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my husband. He absolutely loved it!! It comes with multiple faces and accessories, and the magnetic features are so cool! We'll probably end up getting another!
customer_reviews.author: Renee L

customer_reviews.title: Best Nendoroid
customer_reviews.text: This is the best nendroid I have ever seen, and its just fantastic. I am hoping in the future they will add more parts to add onto him! The magnets are an ingenious idea for the pink puff!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkie

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: A part broke right after opening it not sure why these are so expensive when they are very poorly made 🙄
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little Kirby
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this with his birthday money. It is made nice and he loves it. Comes with many pieces and the arms and legs are magnetic. So they can be moved all over him. Happy with this purchase even if it’s a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Figure is small, but very adorable!
customer_reviews.text: This figure is so freaking adorable. Just by looking at it is enough to make me smile. The only downside is that the figure won’t be able to stand on its own without the support stand it comes with. Other than that, the detail on it is 5/5 highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Samuel Jamin

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute figure with magnets. I got mine for only 60 bucksz but the prices fluctuate.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent figure, details were wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Excellent figure, details were wonderful. I love how even his little mouth is slightly carved in to look more realistic. This is our first nendoroid, and I have to say, I don't think it can be topped. The colors are vivid, and the fact that his arms and feet are magnetic makes him infinitely poseable!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So darn cute.
customer_reviews.text: Made excellently, with a special magnetic body, allowing you to position the hands and feet in almost any position on Kirby's round body. Getting creative, you might be able to come up with a new action pose for every day of the year with different faces, but limited accessories. So darn cute.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Mansell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everything :)
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived earlier than expected and the box was packaged neatly too! No dents in the kirby box either! No complaints so if you’re thinking about buying this kirby...you should :)
customer_reviews.author: jocelyn alvarez

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: For my first Nendroid, I must say i'm impressed. High-quality, reasonable price, and a type of plastic coating I can't describe but thatfeels like silk, Kirby is definetly a great figure!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Collectors and Fan Girls will love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Fan service...pure collectable fan service! Execution of quality on this product is best I've seen!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wolf

customer_reviews.title: ... a fan of Kirby and admit this nendoroid is perfect. The idea of using magnets for the hands ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a fan of Kirby and admit this nendoroid is perfect. The idea of using magnets for the hands and shoes is ingenious. The amount of poses is near limitless and you can also use his third arm to put on his back to make him stand! That's what I do. His two extra faces are perfect! I got mine from Amazon/ prime so my figure was completely authentic as expected. Very pleased! He's an awesome addition to my collection.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Oliver Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Best Kirby figure that ever existed!
customer_reviews.text: fantastic figure and the very best figure we have ever gotten of this character! All parts are smoothly sculpted and make it look exactly like Kirby! Comes with interesting accessories and great faces to swap for all kinds of poses and expressions. highly recommend this figure for anyone who is a fan of Kirby!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Smyth

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: These things are so cool. Wish Toys were this nice when I was a kid!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Radcliffe

customer_reviews.title: It may look cool but don't think it's cheap
customer_reviews.text: I think the toys cool but I do not think it's worth the price and also I'm the child of this customer
customer_reviews.author: ana

customer_reviews.title: Fast and great quality
customer_reviews.text: At first when i ordered this, the shipping told me it would not be recieved for 1 to 2 weeks, i ordered on a sat, it was there on monday! Fantastic! This is vy far the.best kirby figure iv seen, it arived in excellent condition and was a fantastic gift for my friend!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Irving

customer_reviews.title: Kirby Toys are Hard to Find, This is a Good One
customer_reviews.text: Very cool toy, easy to use and interchange the parts because they are all magnetic. Expensive for a figure set, but actually worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Madison

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST!
customer_reviews.text: This is super awesome and I highly recommend it to big time Kirby fans!
customer_reviews.author: Josue Mendez

customer_reviews.title: This is the best Nendoroid in my collection HANDS DOWN
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Nendoroid in my collection HANDS DOWN!! His hands and feet are magnetic, so posing him is very easy and near limitless. If you're a fan of the Kirby franchise, pick him up, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: NanoPrime8

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo cute! I wish there's more than 1 body to change!
customer_reviews.author: Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! It's super!
customer_reviews.text: It was in good quality and very fun! The hands and feet are magnets, so you can move them all around the body. Changing the faces was fun too! This is a very fun and great Kirby Nendoroid!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Nendoroid! The idea to use magnets to attach Kirby's arms and legs is absolutely brilliant :)
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Humberto Aragón Coronado

customer_reviews.title: Very nice high quality Kirby figure!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Kirby figure! I've been a fan of the Kirby franchise for a while now so it's nice to see Nendroid come out with a figure. Pros. - The texture of the figure is a soft plastic type material, I don't know how to describe it but it's definitely softer than just regular plastic! - The body parts are magnetic so they come off and on easily! - It comes with different faces and accessories which I love! Cons. - Pricey :( - Maybe it's just mine but I can't get the mine to fit on the stand. I wish mine would fit on the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Julia ☆

customer_reviews.title: Kirby Has Never Been Better!!
customer_reviews.text: This figure is absolutely perfect! I love it so much. Its my favorite figure I own yet. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Fierke

customer_reviews.title: he keeps it on his desk and seems to enjoy it as decoration
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my brother's birthday, he keeps it on his desk and seems to enjoy it as decoration.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: My fiance loved it. The item came on time
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loved it. The item came on time, with really good packaging. The kirby was bigger than I expected which made it even better!
customer_reviews.author: SleeplessNight

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: WAY earlier then expected! Everything was in prime condition. The figure itself is amazing quality. Always love Good Smile products.
customer_reviews.author: Scoopsss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Came as described. It was one of the Nendoroids that I wanted the most! It is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BUY HIM
customer_reviews.text: This figure has instantly become one of the best figures in my collection. The magnetic limbs were an ingenious idea, the material and build is top notch, and there are a plethora of accessories that he comes with. The only minor gripe I may have with him is that you sort of need the stand he comes with to have him upright.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Beginners
customer_reviews.text: This Kirby Nendoroid is perfect for beginners. Kirby is very easy to work with when moving his arms (which his arms are magnets) and the faces are also easily swappable. I didn't have a problem getting Kirby into the stand. This Nendoroid is better built than most others and is quite different because of Kirby's sphere shape. One of my favorite Nendoroids from its build and cuteness!
customer_reviews.author: Semper32

customer_reviews.title: Freaking adorable.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that Kirby is perfectly spherical makes the magnetic limbs an ingenious move. You can literally set up any post. Comes with a bunch of cool accessories like the star want and link hat. I thought I saw a version online with the maximum tomato prop, but this one does not come with it.
customer_reviews.author: J.Chen

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson Needs a monster to Clobber that there Kirby
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my Grandson and he loves it! He's been walking around the house with his Kirby toy.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Fine work and it comes with a lot of accessories
customer_reviews.text: I picked this figure up mainly because of the ingenious use of magnets in it. Fine work and it comes with a lot of accessories, Check out my video review here [...] or the pictures below.
customer_reviews.author: Jason The X

product_meta.title: Good Smile Kirby's Dream Land: Kirby Nendoroid Action Figure
product_meta.description: From Good Smile Company. From the popular game series Kirby's Dream Land comes a Nendoroid of Kirby himself! The Nendoroid makes use of a number of magnets for posing, making his movements smooth, natural and easy to pose! He also comes with four different expressions parts, including his standard smiling face, a more serious face, an expression with his mouth wide open to display his using the inhaling ability, plus an expanded expression to show him filled up after inhaling! A collection of optional parts are also included, such as parts that allow you to display him using the Copy Abilities "Sword", "Fire" and "Star Rod". All sorts of optional parts to recreate your favorite scenes from the game in Nendoroid size.
feature_bullets: Additional included parts recreate scenes from the game

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
